Job Description

Job Title: Marketing & Project Manager

Ready to come to work for a small, agile, well-established faucet manufacturing company that's growing rapidly? At Pioneer Industries, we are seeking a highly organized and creative Marketing & Project Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing marketing initiatives and managing projects from conception to completion. This role requires a combination of marketing expertise, project management skills, and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve business objectives. Additionally, the role involves communicating project status updates, milestones, and issues to the manager regularly, as well as conducting post-project evaluations to identify areas for improvement and lessons learned. This role reports directly to the VP of Marketing.

Responsibilities:

  • Assist in the develop and implementation of strategic marketing plans to drive brand awareness and customer engagement.
  • Participate in the planning and project management of content creation for marketing materials, including website copy, blog posts, and promotional materials.
  • Coordinate with graphic designers, content creators, and external agencies to produce high-quality marketing assets.
  • Monitor and analyze the performance of marketing campaigns using analytics tools and adjust strategies as needed.
  • Oversee the creation, production, and distribution of video content to support marketing campaigns and brand initiatives.
  • Manage merchandising projects, ensuring alignment with marketing strategies and brand guidelines.
  • Collaborate with sales teams to develop marketing collateral and support lead generation efforts.
  • Interface with project teams to ensure projects are delivered on time, and within project scope.
  • Communicate project status updates, milestones, and issues to manager regularly.
  • Conduct post-project evaluations to identify areas for improvement and lessons learned.
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in marketing and project management.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, or equivalent work experience.
  • 4-5 years of proven experience in marketing and project management roles.
  • Strong understanding of digital marketing strategies and tools.
  • Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and Google Workspace.
  • Experience with Adobe Creative Suite, Hubspot, Salesforce, SAP B1 and Plytix a plus.
  • Certification in project management (e.g., PMP, CAPM) a plus.

Summary:

This Marketing & Project Manager position offers an exciting opportunity to lead innovative marketing initiatives and drive project success in a dynamic and collaborative environment. If you are passionate about marketing, have strong project management skills, and thrive in a results-driven team, we would love to hear from you. Apply now to join our team and make an impact!
